Sentencas: In this paper the simulation and heat integration of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) integrated with an ethanol steam reforming system are carried out.
Titulo: An auto-sustainable solid oxide fuel cell system fueled by bio-ethanol Process simulation and heat exchanger network synthesis

Sentencas: The ethanol reaction is studied using a novel kinetic model reported in a previous work.
Titulo: An auto-sustainable solid oxide fuel cell system fueled by bio-ethanol Process simulation and heat exchanger network synthesis

Sentencas: The system and fuel cell efficiencies are studied under different process conditions, temperature (723 < T < 873 K), water to ethanol molar ratio (3 < R-AE < 6) and fuel utilization coefficient (0.7 < FUC < 0.9).
Titulo: An auto-sustainable solid oxide fuel cell system fueled by bio-ethanol Process simulation and heat exchanger network synthesis

Sentencas: The SOFC off gases are mixed and fed to an after burner providing heat to the process.
Titulo: An auto-sustainable solid oxide fuel cell system fueled by bio-ethanol Process simulation and heat exchanger network synthesis

Sentencas: Two heat exchanger networks are designed considering the influence of the fuel utilization coefficient (0.7-0.9) at the cell electrodes.
Titulo: An auto-sustainable solid oxide fuel cell system fueled by bio-ethanol Process simulation and heat exchanger network synthesis

Sentencas: If the SOFC is operated at FUC < 0.8 a self sufficient limit could otherwise extra ethanol must be combusted with an overall efficiency penalty.
Titulo: An auto-sustainable solid oxide fuel cell system fueled by bio-ethanol Process simulation and heat exchanger network synthesis

Sentencas: A process be established, flow diagram is proposed in order to obtain a high efficiency and to avoid the use of any external source of energy.
Titulo: An auto-sustainable solid oxide fuel cell system fueled by bio-ethanol Process simulation and heat exchanger network synthesis
An auto-sustainable solid oxide fuel cell system fueled by bio-ethanol Process simulation and heat exchanger network synthesis
